name: structure
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

dsense.name: structure
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: the way in which the parts of a system or object are arranged or organized, or a system arranged in this way

example.eg: the grammatical structure of a sentence
The structure of this protein is particularly complex.
example.egtrans: 这种蛋白质的结构特别复杂。

example.eg: They have a very old-fashioned management structure.
example.egtrans: 他们的管理体系非常落伍。

example.eg: Some people like the sense of structure that a military lifestyle imposes.
example.egtrans: 一些人喜欢军事化生活方式所特有的条理性。

dsense.name: structure
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: something that has been made or built from parts, especially a large building
trans_examp.trans_cn: 结构体；（尤指）大型建筑物

example.eg: The proposed new office tower is a steel and glass structure 43 storeys high.
example.egtrans: 拟议建造的新办公大楼是一栋高43层的钢铁玻璃结构的建筑物。

dsense.name: structure
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: an organ in the body, or part of an organ, that does a particular job

name: structure
posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to plan, organize, or arrange the parts of something

example.eg: We must carefully structure and rehearse each scene.
example.egtrans: 我们每一场戏都必须认真构思、认真排练。
